00001 #include "CellGraph.h"

00004 //reads in obj with uniform quads, makes a cell from each face. Cells are used for cell space partitioning and path finding. Obj should be the walkable area of the map.
00005 CellGraph::CellGraph(const char *_fileName, int _borderSize)
00006 {
00007 
00008     m_entityMgr = new EntityManager();
00009 
00010     std::vector<ngl::Vec3> vertices;
00011     std::vector<ngl::Vec4> faces;
00012     float upperBoundry = 0.0f;
00013     float lowerBoundry = 0.0f;
00014     float leftBoundry = 0.0f;
00015     float rightBoundry = 0.0f;
00016 
00017     std::ifstream in(_fileName, std::ios::in);
00018     if (!in) { std::cerr<< "Cannot open file: " << _fileName << std::endl; exit(1); }
00019 
00020     std::string line;
00021     while (getline(in, line))
00022     {
00023         //make a vector of vertices
00024         if (line.substr(0,2) == "v ")
00025         {
00026           std::istringstream s(line.substr(2));
00027           ngl::Vec3 v; s >> v.m_x; s >> v.m_y; s >> v.m_z;
00028           vertices.push_back(v);
00029           if(v.m_z < upperBoundry){upperBoundry = v.m_z;}
00030           if(v.m_z > lowerBoundry){lowerBoundry = v.m_z;}
00031           if(v.m_x < leftBoundry){leftBoundry = v.m_x;}
00032           if(v.m_x > rightBoundry){rightBoundry = v.m_x;}
00033         }
00034 
00035         //make a vector of faces
00036         else if (line.substr(0,2) == "f ")
00037         {
00038            std::istringstream s(line.substr(2));
00039            std::string rawVertId1, rawVertId2,rawVertId3,rawVertId4;
00040 
00041            s >> rawVertId1;
00042            s >> rawVertId2;
00043            s >> rawVertId3;
00044            s >> rawVertId4;
00045 
00046            std::string vertId1,vertId2,vertId3,vertId4;
00047 
00048            //Get rid of slashes in .obj files:
00049            for(unsigned int i =0; i<rawVertId1.length(); i++)
00050            {
00051              if (std::ispunct(rawVertId1[i]))
00052              {
00053                  break;
00054              }
00055              vertId1 = vertId1+rawVertId1[i];
00056            }
00057            for(unsigned int i =0; i<rawVertId2.length(); i++)
00058            {
00059              if (std::ispunct(rawVertId2[i]))
00060              {
00061                  break;
00062              }
00063              vertId2 = vertId2+rawVertId2[i];
00064            }
00065 
00066 
00067            for(unsigned int i =0; i<rawVertId3.length(); i++)
00068            {
00069              if (std::ispunct(rawVertId3[i]))
00070              {
00071                  break;
00072              }
00073              vertId3 = vertId3+rawVertId3[i];
00074            }
00075 
00076 
00077            for(unsigned int i =0; i<rawVertId4.length(); i++)
00078            {
00079              if (std::ispunct(rawVertId4[i]))
00080              {
00081                  break;
00082              }
00083              vertId4 = vertId4+rawVertId4[i];
00084            }
00085 
00086            int a = std::atoi(vertId1.c_str());
00087            int b =std::atoi(vertId2.c_str());
00088            int c =std::atoi(vertId3.c_str());
00089            int d = std::atoi(vertId4.c_str());
00090 
00091            ngl::Vec4 newFace;
00092            newFace.m_x=a;
00093            newFace.m_y=b;
00094            newFace.m_z=c;
00095            newFace.m_w=d;
00096 
00097            faces.push_back(newFace);
00098         }
00099         else if (line[0] == '#') { /* ignoring this line */ }
00100         else { /* ignoring this line */ }
00101     }
00102 
00103     //Now we make the cells from the informations stored in faces.
00104     m_numberOfCells = faces.size();
00105     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m_numberOfCells; j++)
00106     {
00107         std::vector<ngl::Vec3> fourCorners;
00108 
00109         fourCorners.push_back(vertices[(faces[j].m_x-1)]);
00110         fourCorners.push_back(vertices[(faces[j].m_y-1)]);
00111         fourCorners.push_back(vertices[(faces[j].m_z-1)]);
00112         fourCorners.push_back(vertices[(faces[j].m_w-1)]);
00113 
00114 
00115        //find the neighbouring cells (cells that share vertices)
00116 
00117        std::vector<int> neighbourIDs;
00118        std::vector<int> perpendicularNeighbourIDs;
00119 
00120         for (unsigned int i=0 ;i<m_numberOfCells;i++)
00121         {
00122             // j is the cell (face) we are creating. i is cell we are checking against.
00123            if (faces[j].m_x == faces[i].m_x || faces[j].m_y == faces[i].m_x ||
00124                    faces[j].m_z == faces[i].m_x || faces[j].m_w == faces[i].m_x||
00125 
00126                    faces[j].m_x == faces[i].m_y || faces[j].m_y == faces[i].m_y ||
00127                                        faces[j].m_z == faces[i].m_y || faces[j].m_w == faces[i].m_y||
00128 
00129                    faces[j].m_x == faces[i].m_z || faces[j].m_y == faces[i].m_z ||
00130                                        faces[j].m_z == faces[i].m_z || faces[j].m_w == faces[i].m_z||
00131 
00132                    faces[j].m_x == faces[i].m_w || faces[j].m_y == faces[i].m_w ||
00133                                        faces[j].m_z == faces[i].m_w || faces[j].m_w == faces[i].m_w)
00134            {
00135                if( i != j)
00136                {
00137 
00138 
00139                neighbourIDs.push_back(i);
00140                }
00141            }
00142         }
00143 
00144         Cell newCell(j,fourCorners,neighbourIDs, perpendicularNeighbourIDs);
00145         m_cells.push_back(newCell);
00146 
00147         if (j == 0)
00148         {
00149             m_cellSize = m_cells[0].getSize();
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00153     //Give each cell a list of its perpendicular nieghbours
00154     for ( int i =0; i< m_numberOfCells; i++)
00155     {
00156         for ( int j=0; j< m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs().size();j++)
00157         {
00158             m_cells[m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs()[j]];
00159             if ( m_cells[m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs()[j]].getCentre().m_x == m_cells[i].getCentre().m_x
00160                  || m_cells[m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs()[j]].getCentre().m_z == m_cells[i].getCentre().m_z)
00161             {
00162                 m_cells[i].addPerpendicularNeighbourID(m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs()[j]);
00163             }
00164         }
00165     }
00166 
00167     //now we offset the boundries to define playable area
00168     m_mapBounds.push_back(upperBoundry+m_cellSize*_borderSize);
00169     m_mapBounds.push_back(lowerBoundry-m_cellSize*_borderSize);
00170     m_mapBounds.push_back(leftBoundry+m_cellSize*_borderSize);
00171     m_mapBounds.push_back(rightBoundry-m_cellSize*_borderSize);
00172 
00173     //now we make the vector of exitCells
00174     for (int i =0; i< m_numberOfCells; i++)
00175     {
00176         if (m_cells[i].getCentre().m_z < m_mapBounds[0]
00177                 || m_cells[i].getCentre().m_z > m_mapBounds[1]
00178                 || m_cells[i].getCentre().m_x < m_mapBounds[2]
00179                 || m_cells[i].getCentre().m_x > m_mapBounds[3])
00180         {
00181             m_exitPoints.push_back(m_cells[i].getCentre());
00182         }
00183     }
00184 }

00197 bool CellGraph::entityIsInCell(int _cellID, BaseGameEntity *_entity)
00198 {
00199   //check up down left right
00200 
00201   float upper = m_cells[_cellID].getBoundaries().m_x;
00202   float lower = m_cells[_cellID].getBoundaries().m_y;
00203   float left  = m_cells[_cellID].getBoundaries().m_z;
00204   float right = m_cells[_cellID].getBoundaries().m_w;
00205 
00206   if(_entity->getPos().m_z >= upper && _entity->getPos().m_z <= lower &&
00207      _entity->getPos().m_x >= left && _entity->getPos().m_x <= right)
00208   {
00209     return true;
00210   }
00211 
00212   else
00213   {
00214    return false;
00215   }
00216 
00217 }
00218 
00219 void CellGraph::initializeCells(BaseGameEntity *_entity)
00220 {
00221       for (unsigned int i=0; i < m_numberOfCells; i++)
00222       {
00223 
00224           if (entityIsInCell(i, _entity) == true)
00225           {
00226               m_cells[i].addDynamicEntityID(_entity->getID());
00227               _entity->setCurrentCellID(i);
00228               _entity->setCurrentCell(m_cells[i]);
00229               return;
00230           }
00231       }
00232       _entity->setCurrentCellID(-1);
00233 }
00234 
00235 
00236 void CellGraph::updateCells(BaseGameEntity *_entity)
00237 {
00238   if (entityIsInCell(_entity->getCurrentCellID(), _entity) == true)
00239   {
00240     m_cells[_entity->getCurrentCellID()].addDynamicEntityID(_entity->getID());
00241   }
00242   else
00243   {
00244     for (int i = 0; i < _entity->getCurrentCell().getNeighbourCellIDs().size(); i++)
00245     {
00246       int currentNeighbourID = _entity->getCurrentCell().getNeighbourCellIDs()[i];
00247       if (entityIsInCell(currentNeighbourID, _entity) == true)
00248       {
00249         m_cells[currentNeighbourID].addDynamicEntityID(_entity->getID());
00250         _entity->setCurrentCellID(currentNeighbourID);
00251         _entity->setCurrentCell(m_cells[currentNeighbourID]);
00252       }
00253     }
00254   }
00255 }
00256 
00257 void CellGraph::clearCells()
00258 {
00259 
00260     for (unsigned int i = 0; i<m_numberOfCells; i++)
00261     {
00262         m_cells[i].clearDynamicEntityIDs();
00263     }
00264 }

00266 void CellGraph::addEntities(BaseGameEntity *_entity)
00267 {
00268   // 1. add agents in current cell
00269   // 2. add agents in neighbouring cells
00270 
00271   if (_entity >= 0)
00272   {
00273 
00274     //Clear the ID vectors of the previous tick:
00275     _entity->clearDetectedDynamicEntityID();
00276     _entity->clearAgentIDs();
00277 
00278     //Do the test but against the cell the entity's in:
00279    int numberOfEntiesInCurrentCell = m_cells[_entity->getCurrentCellID()].getDynamicEntityIDs().size();
00280 
00281 
00282    for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfEntiesInCurrentCell; i++)
00283    {
00284        if (_entity->getID() != m_cells[_entity->getCurrentCellID()].getDynamicEntityIDs()[i])
00285        {
00286 
00287 
00288           _entity->addDetectedDynamicEntityID(m_cells[_entity->getCurrentCellID()].getDynamicEntityIDs()[i]);
00289        }
00290 
00291    }
00292 
00293     //for each neighbour
00294     int numberOfCellsToCheck = m_cells[(_entity->getCurrentCellID())].getNeighbourCellIDs().size();
00295     //loops through all neighbour cells
00296     for (int i = 0; i < numberOfCellsToCheck; i++)
00297     {
00298 
00299         int currentNeighbourCell = m_cells[(_entity->getCurrentCellID())].getNeighbourCellIDs()[i];
00300         //Tests all entities in neighbouring cells against the entity's detection radius and adds it to its detected neighbours:
00301         numberOfEntiesInCurrentCell = m_cells[currentNeighbourCell].getDynamicEntityIDs().size();
00302 
00303         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfEntiesInCurrentCell; i++)
00304         {
00305             //std::cout<<"called by addEntities"<<std::endl;
00306 
00307           ngl::Vec3 vectorToEntity = _entity->getPos()- (m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_cells[currentNeighbourCell].getDynamicEntityIDs()[i])->getPos());
00308           if(vectorToEntity.lengthSquared() <= (_entity->getDetectionRadius()*_entity->getDetectionRadius()))
00309           {
00310             _entity->addDetectedDynamicEntityID(m_cells[currentNeighbourCell].getDynamicEntityIDs()[i]);
00311 
00312           }
00313         }
00314     }
00315 
00316   }
00317   //Now the entity has a vector of detected entities, append them to the appropriate vector ie Police, Rioters etc
00318   for (unsigned int i =0; i< _entity->getDetectedEntityIDs().size(); i++)
00319   {
00320       //std::cout<<"called by add Entities 2"<<std::endl;
00321       if ( m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(_entity->getDetectedEntityIDs()[i])->getEntityType() == typePolice)
00322       {
00323           _entity->addPoliceID(_entity->getDetectedEntityIDs()[i]);
00324       }
00325       //std::cout<<"called by addEntities 3"<<std::endl;
00326       else if ( m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(_entity->getDetectedEntityIDs()[i])->getEntityType() == typeRioter)
00327       {
00328           _entity->addRioterID(_entity->getDetectedEntityIDs()[i]);
00329       }
00330       else if ( m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(_entity->getDetectedEntityIDs()[i])->getEntityType() == typeStaticEntity)
00331       {
00332           _entity->addObstacleID(_entity->getDetectedEntityIDs()[i]);
00333       }
00334   }
00335 }
00336 
00337 void CellGraph::generateWalls()
00338 {
00339     for (unsigned int i=0; i < m_numberOfCells; i++)
00340     {
00341         bool upperWall = true, lowerWall = true, leftWall =  true,  rightWall= true;
00342 
00343         //Test for each wall against 3 conditions,
00344         //if no neighbour centre is detected, the bool remains true:
00345 
00346         for ( int j =0; j < m_cells[i].getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs().size(); j ++)
00347         {
00348             ngl::Vec3 currentNeighbourCentre = m_cells[m_cells[i].getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs()[j]].getCentre();
00349 
00350 
00351             //Check for upper wall:
00352             if(currentNeighbourCentre.m_z < m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x
00353                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_x > m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z
00354                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_x < m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w)
00355             {
00356                 upperWall = false;
00357             }
00358             //Check for lower wall:
00359             if(currentNeighbourCentre.m_z > m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y
00360                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_x > m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z
00361                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_x < m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w)
00362             {
00363                 lowerWall = false;
00364             }
00365             //Check for left wall:
00366             if(currentNeighbourCentre.m_x < m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z
00367                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_z < m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y
00368                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_z > m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x)
00369             {
00370                 leftWall = false;
00371             }
00372             //Check for right wall
00373             if(currentNeighbourCentre.m_x > m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w
00374                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_z < m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y
00375                     && currentNeighbourCentre.m_z > m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x)
00376             {
00377                 rightWall = false;
00378             }
00379 
00380 
00381 
00382         }
00383 
00384         //Now make the walls depending on the bool
00385         if(upperWall == true)
00386         {
00387             ngl::Vec3 start = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x);
00388             ngl::Vec3 end = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x);
00389             Wall newWall;
00390             newWall.start =start;
00391             newWall.end = end;
00392             newWall.normal = ngl::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
00393             m_cells[i].addWallInCell(newWall);
00394 
00395             ngl::Vec3 centre = (start+end)/2.0;
00396             m_wallCentres.push_back(centre);
00397             m_wallNormals.push_back(ngl::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f));
00398             m_wallRotations.push_back(-90);
00399 
00400         }
00401         if(lowerWall == true)
00402         {
00403             ngl::Vec3 start = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y);
00404             ngl::Vec3 end = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y);
00405             Wall newWall;
00406             newWall.start =start;
00407             newWall.end = end;
00408             newWall.normal = ngl::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,-1.0f);
00409             m_cells[i].addWallInCell(newWall);
00410 
00411             ngl::Vec3 centre = (start+end)/2.0;
00412             m_wallCentres.push_back(centre);
00413             m_wallNormals.push_back(ngl::Vec3(0.0f,0.0f,-1.0f));
00414             m_wallRotations.push_back(90);
00415 
00416         }
00417         if(leftWall == true)
00418         {
00419             ngl::Vec3 start = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y);
00420             ngl::Vec3 end = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x);
00421             Wall newWall;
00422             newWall.start =start;
00423             newWall.end = end;
00424             newWall.normal = ngl::Vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
00425             m_cells[i].addWallInCell(newWall);
00426 
00427             ngl::Vec3 centre = (start+end)/2.0;
00428             m_wallCentres.push_back(centre);
00429             m_wallNormals.push_back(ngl::Vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00430             m_wallRotations.push_back(0);
00431 
00432         }
00433         if(rightWall == true)
00434         {
00435             ngl::Vec3 start = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x);
00436             ngl::Vec3 end = ngl::Vec3(m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w, 0.0f, m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y);
00437             Wall newWall;
00438             newWall.start =start;
00439             newWall.end = end;
00440             newWall.normal = ngl::Vec3(-1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
00441             m_cells[i].addWallInCell(newWall);
00442 
00443             ngl::Vec3 centre = (start+end)/2.0;
00444             m_wallCentres.push_back(centre);
00445             m_wallNormals.push_back(ngl::Vec3(-1.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00446             m_wallRotations.push_back(180);
00447         }
00448 
00449 
00450     }
00451 
00452     //Now append all neighbours walls to each cell
00453     for (int i =0; i < m_numberOfCells; i++)
00454         {
00455           for (int j = 0; j < m_cells[i].getWallsInCell().size(); j++)
00456           {
00457                 Wall wallToAdd = m_cells[i].getWallsInCell()[j];
00458                 m_cells[i].addWall(wallToAdd);
00459           }
00460             int numberOfNeighbours = m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs().size();
00461 
00462             for(int j = 0; j < numberOfNeighbours; j++)
00463             {
00464                 for( int k=0; k<m_cells[m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs()[j]].getWallsInCell().size();k++)
00465                 {
00466                     Wall wallToAdd = m_cells[m_cells[i].getNeighbourCellIDs()[j]].getWallsInCell()[k];
00467                     m_cells[i].addWall(wallToAdd);
00468                 }
00469 
00470             }
00471         }
00472 
00473 }

00475 
00476 bool CellGraph::posIsInCell(ngl::Vec3 _pos)
00477 {
00478     for (int i=0; i<m_numberOfCells; i++)
00479     {
00480         float upper = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x;
00481         float lower = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y;
00482         float left  = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z;
00483         float right = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w;
00484 
00485         if(_pos.m_z >= upper && _pos.m_z <= lower &&
00486            _pos.m_x >= left && _pos.m_x <= right)
00487         {
00488              return true;
00489         }
00490     }
00491    return false;
00492 }

00495 
00496 std::vector<ngl::Vec3> CellGraph::findPath(BaseGameEntity *_from, ngl::Vec3 _to)
00497 {
00498     std::vector<ngl::Vec3> finalPath;
00499     finalPath.clear();
00500 
00501     int endCellID = -1;
00502 
00503     for (int i=0; i<m_numberOfCells; i++)
00504     {
00505         float upper = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_x;
00506         float lower = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_y;
00507         float left  = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_z;
00508         float right = m_cells[i].getBoundaries().m_w;
00509 
00510         if(_to.m_z >= upper && _to.m_z <= lower &&
00511            _to.m_x >= left && _to.m_x <= right)
00512         {
00513              endCellID = i;
00514              break;
00515         }
00516     }
00517 
00518     if(endCellID == -1)
00519     {
00520         std::cout<<"You have not chosen a valid position"<<std::endl;
00521         return finalPath;
00522     }
00523 
00524    int startCellID = _from->getCurrentCellID();
00525    Cell *endCell = &m_cells[endCellID];
00526    int currentCellID = startCellID;
00527    Cell *currentCell = &m_cells[currentCellID];
00528 
00529 
00530 
00531    std::vector<int> frontierCells; //IDs of cells to be tested
00532    std::vector<int> frontierMemory; // list of all cell IDs that have ever been held in frontierCells.
00533 
00534    std::vector<int> priorityQueue;
00535    int priorityCell;
00536 
00537    std::vector<std::vector<int> > SPTs; // vector of search paths (of cell IDs), new ones are added when cells cannot be added sequentially.
00538                                         // This happens when a new frontier is tested that is not perpendicular to the previous SPT element.
00539 
00540    //Create start SPT, the firt element of which is  _from
00541    std::vector<int> newSPT;
00542    //Push it into SPTs
00543    newSPT.push_back(startCellID);
00544    SPTs.push_back(newSPT);
00545 
00546    frontierMemory.push_back(startCellID);
00547 
00549 
00550     while (currentCellID != endCellID)
00551     {
00552 
00553     //Clear priority Q:
00554     priorityQueue.clear();
00555 
00556     //Remove currentCell from frontierCells:
00557     for (std::vector<int>::iterator iter = frontierCells.begin(); iter != frontierCells.end(); ++iter)
00558     {
00559         if( *iter == currentCellID)
00560         {
00561             frontierCells.erase(iter);
00562             break;
00563         }
00564     }
00565 
00566     //Add perpendicular neighbours to frontierCells:
00567     int numberOfPerpendicularNeighbours = currentCell->getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs().size();
00568     for ( int i=0; i <numberOfPerpendicularNeighbours;i++)
00569     {
00570         bool isInMemory = false;
00571 
00572         for (int j=0; j<frontierMemory.size();j++)
00573         {
00574             if( currentCell->getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs()[i] == frontierMemory[j])
00575             {
00576                 isInMemory = true;
00577                 break;
00578             }
00579         }
00580 
00581         if ( isInMemory ==false)
00582         {
00583             frontierCells.push_back(currentCell->getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs()[i]);
00584             frontierMemory.push_back(currentCell->getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs()[i]);
00585         }
00586     }
00587 
00588     // Find the frontier cell that is closest to the destination
00589     float shortestDist = 10000000000.0f;
00590     int shortestID;
00591     int frontierSize = frontierCells.size();
00592     for (int i=0; i<frontierSize;i++ )
00593     {
00594         ngl::Vec3 distance = (m_cells[frontierCells[i]].getCentre() - endCell->getCentre());
00595 
00596         if(distance.lengthSquared() <shortestDist)
00597         {
00598             shortestDist = distance.lengthSquared();
00599             shortestID = frontierCells[i];
00600         }
00601     }
00602     priorityCell=shortestID;
00603 
00604 //3-Add currentCell to SPT
00605   //Check the latest value of the latest SPT, if the currentCell is perpendicular then add to that SPT.
00606 
00607     bool flag = false;
00608 
00609     if (currentCellID != startCellID)
00610     {
00611 
00612         for (int i = SPTs.size()-1; i >= 0; i--)
00613         {
00614             newSPT.clear();
00615 
00616             for ( int j = 0; j < SPTs[i].size(); j++)
00617             {
00618                 Cell *SPTCell = &m_cells[SPTs[i][j]];
00619 
00620                 newSPT.push_back(SPTs[i][j]);
00621 
00622                 for ( int k=0; k<SPTCell->getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs().size();k++)
00623                 {
00624                     if(flag == false)
00625                     {
00626                         if(currentCellID == SPTCell->getPerpendicularNeighbourCellIDs()[k])
00627                         {
00628                             if(j+1==SPTs[i].size())
00629                             {
00630                                 newSPT.push_back(currentCellID);
00631 
00632                                 if(i == SPTs.size())
00633                                 {
00634                                     SPTs.back() = newSPT;
00635                                 }
00636                                 else
00637                                 {
00638                                     SPTs.push_back(newSPT);
00639                                 }
00640                                 flag = true;
00641 
00642 
00643                             }
00644                             else
00645                             {
00646                                 newSPT.push_back(currentCellID);
00647                                 SPTs.push_back(newSPT);
00648                                 flag = true;
00649                             }
00650                         }
00651                     }
00652                 }
00653             }
00654         }
00655     }
00656 
00657 
00658     //Now actual search:
00659 
00661     // Clear priorityQueue.
00662     // Remove currentCell from frontier.
00663     // Get perpendicular neighbours of cell. Add them to frontier if they are not in frontier memory.
00664 
00666     // Order the frontier by closest to destination, in priorityQueue.
00667 
00669     // Checks the last SPT in SPTs. From the first element, check if the currentCell is perpendicular.
00670     // If it is perpendicular to the final element, simply append to that SPT vector.
00671     // If not, then create a new SPT vector from the start of the current SPT to the first perpendicular element, append currentCell.
00672     // If not perpendicular to ANY elements in the latest SPT, go to the previous SPT and perform check again. -Do not delete the last SPT.
00673 
00675     // Set currentCell to the first element of priorityQueue.
00676 
00678 
00679 
00680     currentCellID = priorityCell;
00681     currentCell = &m_cells[currentCellID];
00682 
00683     }
00684 
00686 
00687     SPTs.back().push_back(endCellID);
00688 
00689 
00690     for( int i = 0; i< SPTs.back().size(); i++)
00691     {
00692       finalPath.push_back(m_cells[SPTs.back()[i]].getCentre());
00693     }
00694 
00695     finalPath.push_back(_to);
00696 
00697     return finalPath;
00698 }
